revised_title: Shells and their Uses: A Study by Samuel Dale and Martyn Lister
tldr: In this article, Samuel Dale and Martyn Lister discuss various aspects of shells, including their classification, identification, and uses. They also delve into the historical shell trade and the secrets surrounding the production of purple dye. The authors provide detailed descriptions of different types of shells and their properties, contributing to the understanding of malacology during the time.
